name: Crazy Driver Taxi Duty
description:
Get ready to become the most famous real world passenger transporter and help the people of your the modern city by picking them up while following the arrow you see on your game screen to get you to them. Step up to drive multiple latest models of cabs, park the cab near your passengers, make passenger sit in and drop them to their destinations.

Features:
* 3D Game environment
* Future Taxi Cars
* Immersive gameplay
* Real life sound effects
* Great Music to enjoy
